summary: The customer had some trouble with their Contoso Wireless account and asked for help. The agent provided information on the different options for upgrading their phone, including purchasing a new phone outright, taking advantage of the device financing program, or trading in their current device for credit. The agent also informed the customer of the different types of phones offered and the benefits that come with upgrading through Contoso Wireless. Lastly, the agent provided instructions on how to get started with upgrading their phone.
